__TOC__

'''Xubuntu team report for August 2008'''

===== Artwork =====

* Updated gdm theme (not uploaded).

===== Community =====

* Xubuntu Strategy Document passed first reading at Community Council.

===== Documentation =====

* Jim has started getting things moving again.

===== Marketing =====

* Nothing to report.

===== Packaging, Development, & Testing =====

* Alpha 3 and 4 released.
* Several packages updated (such as thunar-thumbnails).
* Daniel has made excellent progress on integrating samba browsing and sharing in Thunar.
* Migrated seed ownership from Ubuntu Core Developers to Xubuntu Developers.
* Welcomed NCommander as a new Xubuntu Developer.
* NCommander packaged xfce 4.6 snapshot into Xubuntu Developer PPA.
* Xubuntu Testing is looking for a Team Leader. This is an important part of every release. Please contact <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CodySomerville|Cody Somerville]]</nowiki> if you are interested.

===== Website =====

* Cody will outsource the website redesign to a web development firm.
* Xubuntu website project status information is available on the <nowiki>[[Xubuntu-SpecialProjects|Special Projects]]</nowiki> page.
